title: Constant Ping Spikes of Record-Breaking Proportion
body:
So I'm sure people have complained about this countless times before, but I'm gonna do it again. Sorry haha.
I recently began university and since moving here, League has been almost unplayable for me. Whenever I play, my ping ranges anywhere from 40, to 150, to 800, even going as high as 5000 (I'd say about 60% of the time it's well above 300). This mostly happens in public matches too, I seem to do alright in custom games by myself. I would just deal with it and assume my university's internet can't handle online games very well, but League is literally the only game that's having this problem. I've been playing games like Starcraft 2, Diablo 3, Call of Duty, and all of them are fine. My upload and download speeds are fine, it's just something about League. My best friend has been getting into the game and I would love to play with him and coach him, but that's pretty damn hard to do with 1000 ping haha.
Any suggestions?

replies.body: Are you on wifi?  You've got a lot of traffic in university, as well as potential firewall settings, worsened if on wifi.  Run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot any possibilities with your local network.  You may need to reach out to your campus IT, though, to see if any blocks are slowing you down.

I briefly ran through the connection issues guide and it wasn't very helpful. I feel like it shouldn't be a problem on my end though because in general, my internet is fine. Fast download speeds, fast video streaming, I can play any other multiplayer game without any issues, it's only league that gives me problems.

Though your net might seem okay elsewhere, you can still have problems using specific services.  If going through each step of the guide doesn't help, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can work with your specific issue individually and find some options.
